title: Midwest City shooting leaves one teen dead; shooter on loose
content:
MIDWEST CITY, Okla. —
Midwest City police are investigating a shooting that left one teenager dead, and the shooter is still on the loose.
According to authorities, the shooting happened around 1:45 p.m. near the corner of Michael Street and Oxford Avenue in Midwest City.
Police said witnesses told them just before those shots were fired, they saw what looked like a red Pontiac car drive up outside of the juvenile’s house.
Witnesses told police the juvenile walked over to the car, an argument ensued, multiple shots were fired and the victim was struck.
The victim died at the scene.
Police are not releasing his name or age at this time.
“We do have some good leads at this point, we’ve talked to several witnesses, several are at the police station now,” said Brandon Clabes, police chief for Midwest City.
Authorities are still looking for the shooter.
If you have any information, call Midwest City Police at 405-739-1306.
